Name: Marine Array

Items.StringList: Use a single device|Specify desired rated capacity|Specify number of devices
Use Modeled Voltage|7.2kV AC|12kV AC|36kV AC|66kV AC|72.5kV AC|145kV AC|220kV AC|400kV AC|150kV HVDC|300kV HVDC

Caption.String: Specify the number of devices using the Array Layout parameters below.

Items.StringList: Extra Low Voltage (kV < 4)|Low Voltage (4 ≤ kV ≤ 34)|Medium Voltage (34 ≤ kV ≤ 69)|High Voltage (69 ≤ kV ≤ 138)|Extra High Voltage (138 ≤ kV ≤ 345)|Ultra High Voltage (345 ≤ kV ≤ 765)

Caption.String: Row spacing affects calculated cable lengths but not array energy production.
It is not possible to reach the desired array capacity exactly for this device.
Use values from wave resource file

array_sizing_mode.IndexLabels: Use a single device|Specify desired rated capacity|Specify number of devices

device_spacing_in_row.Label: Spacing between devices in a row

export_cable_voltage_choice.Label: Override calculated AC/HVDC option for export cables

use_wavefile_spacing.Label: Use values from wave resource file

Equations: //assume they're laid out in roughly a square
while (rows * floor(cols) != num) //if not evenly divisible
rows -=1; //decrease the number of rows until it does divide evenly
// if number devices is prime, this will continue until rows = 1
